name: Doomsday (itch)
description:
THE ONLY CONTROLS ARE THE ARROW KEYS AND SPACE BAR

**IF THE AUDIO DOESN'T START IMMEDIATELY WITH OBAMA'S FACE, REFRESH THE PAGE**

THIS GAME WAS MADE BY RODRIGO J PEREIRA TAPIA 

ART WAS CONTRIBUTED BY ZACH MARTENS AND BAMBI PEREIRA

LISTEN TO KOMBAT ON BANDCAMP

AND CATCH THEM ON THEIR FULL US TOUR
